text: Grandpa Elliott (born Elliot Small; July 10, 1944 â€“ March 8, 2022), also known as Uncle Remus, was an American street-musician in New Orleans. He played the harmonica and sang. He was a street icon in New Orleans. Small died from problems caused by a skin infection on March 8, 2022, at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Infectious disease deaths in Louisiana Category:Deaths from skin disease Category:Musicians from New Orleans Category:Singers from New Orleans
title: Grandpa Elliott
